item.title: RSS feed to a dot matrix printer
item.description: This little project has turned out as fun as it’s been noisy (rather). Not much to showcase, but I cannot find any reason to get rid of it either. A bash script to turn an RSS news feed in escape-formatted dot-matrix printer text. Or: a questionable waste of time, continuous-form paper, and ink ribbon. Description Quoting the video caption: Those escape sequences that look like line noise are Epson ESC/P control codes, to which my printer (a Citizen 120D+) is partially compliant.
